channel.title: How do I make a voting command in PI?
channel.description: Alright guys, I have made a ::vote command that works, but when me, or other players do it, it opens 2 (000webhost.com) and 1 (actual voting site) how do i make it only open my voting site? And how do i allow players to type ::reward to get a reward of 5m for voting?? I tried the ::reward thingy, and i cant seem to get it right! any help at all? :3

item.title: How do I make a voting command in PI?
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

ston3:

Do you have any idea on how to do this, or give me a tutorial for it? Sorry if im asking to much

Client sided…
